caption.p: In vivo antiviral efficiency of SeNPs functionalized with ribavirin (Se@RBV). (a) Mice infected by H1N1 virus were treated with physiological saline (Mock), RBV, SeNPs, or Se@RBV. (b) H&E and tunnel staining showing that Se@RBV-treated mice displayed reduced lung damages compared to Mock. Reproduced with permission from ref ( 119). Copyright 2018 Dove Press Ltd.
